webwork-tex.statement: Find an equation for the paraboloid \(z = x^{2}+y^{2}\) in spherical coordinates. (Enter rho, phi and theta for \(\rho\), \(\phi\) and \(\theta\), respectively.) \leavevmode\\\relax equation: \mbox{\parbox[t]{27.5ex}{\hrulefill}}
webwork-tex.solution:
\par \par {\bf Solution: }\par SOLUTION \par
The paraboloid has equation \(rho = \frac{\cos\!\left(phi\right)}{\sin^{2}\!\left(phi\right)}\).
\par
